duties_responsibilities.duty: Monitor and process AP and PO vouchers and payments.
Reconcile expense and financial reports, manage and process PO vouchers.
Facilitate payment of vendors, verify federal ID numbers, and resolve discrepancies.
Ensure outstanding obligations are credited upon payment and identify discount opportunities.
Assist with accounting records and ledgers, reconcile monthly statements and transactions.
Record entry of, verify documentation for, and distribute petty cash.
Calculate and report sales tax based on paid invoices.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma required; Business or Accounting degree preferred. Certified Accounts Payable Professional (CAPP) certification preferred.
